overview: TRACKS  1. Devils Plaything  2. Killer Wolf *  3. I'm The One  4. Her Black Wings  + exclusive live and unseen footage of with Glenn Danzig, John Christ, Eerie Von and Chuck Biscuits  Glenn Danzig - vocals  Eerie Von - bass  John Christ - lead guitar  Chuck Biscuits - drums  Produced by: Vincent Giordano  Directed by: Glenn Danzig and Vincent Giordano
title: Danzig: Lucifuge The Video
